name: UIPresentationController
desc: An object that manages the transition animations and the presentation of view controllers onscreen.

items.name: init(presentedViewController: UIViewController, presenting: UIViewController?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a presentation controller for transitioning between the specified view controllers

items.name: var delegate: UIAdaptivePresentationControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object for managing adaptive presentations.

items.name: protocol UIAdaptivePresentationControllerDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods that, in conjunction with a presentation controller, determine how to respond to trait changes in your app.

items.name: var presentingViewController: UIViewController
items.desc: The view controller that is the starting point for the presentation.

items.name: var presentedViewController: UIViewController
items.desc: The view controller being presented.

items.name: var containerView: UIView?
items.desc: The view in which the presentation occurs.

items.name: var presentedView: UIView?
items.desc: The view to be animated by the animator objects during a transition.

items.name: var frameOfPresentedViewInContainerView: CGRect
items.desc: The frame rectangle to assign to the presented view at the end of the animations.

items.name: var overrideTraitCollection: UITraitCollection?
items.desc: Interface traits for the presented view controller, to use in place of traits from the iOS environment.

items.name: func containerViewWillLayoutSubviews()
items.desc: Notifies the presentation controller that layout is about to begin on the views of the container view.

items.name: func containerViewDidLayoutSubviews()
items.desc: Called to notify the presentation controller that layout ended on the views of the container view.

items.name: func presentationTransitionWillBegin()
items.desc: Notifies the presentation controller that the presentation animations are about to start.

items.name: func presentationTransitionDidEnd(Bool)
items.desc: Notifies the presentation controller that the presentation animations finished.

items.name: func dismissalTransitionWillBegin()
items.desc: Notifies the presentation controller that the dismissal animations are about to start.

items.name: func dismissalTransitionDidEnd(Bool)
items.desc: Notifies the presentation controller that the dismissal animations finished.

items.name: var presentationStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: The presentation style of the presented view controller.

items.name: func adaptivePresentationStyle(for: UITraitCollection) -> UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: Returns the presentation style to use for the specified set of traits.

items.name: var adaptivePresentationStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: Returns the presentation style to use when the presented view controller becomes horizontally compact.

items.name: var shouldPresentInFullscreen: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the presentation covers the entire screen.

items.name: var shouldRemovePresentersView: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the presenting view controllerâ€™s view should be removed when the presentation animations finish.
